channel.title: How to make an item
channel.description: how do i make like p ring or somethang a 1 hit item?

item.title: How to make an item
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Your Master, post:5, topic:268971”][quote author=kidzcoder link=topic=354889.msg2718077#msg2718077 date=1237762348]
go into item . cfg and change everything to like 5000
like
this item = 1645 Dragonstone_ring A_valuable_ring. 11681.0944443808 11681.0944443808 14726.2277949171 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000
[/quote]Btw, you should use a other thing like Berserker helm (E) then make everything look like this:

item = ****	Bersker_helm (E)	A_power_full_helm.	11681.0944443808	11681.0944443808	14726.2277949171	8000	8000	8000	8000	8000	8000	8000	8000	5000	5000	5000	5000

Lol, your 508 you released is leeched.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make an item
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“kidzcoder, post:4, topic:268971”]go into item . cfg and change everything to like 5000
like
this item = 1645 Dragonstone_ring A_valuable_ring. 11681.0944443808 11681.0944443808 14726.2277949171 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 [/quote]Btw, you should use a other thing like Berserker helm (E) then make everything look like this:

item = **** Bersker_helm (E) A_power_full_helm. 11681.0944443808 11681.0944443808 14726.2277949171 8000 8000 8000 8000 8000 8000 8000 8000 5000 5000 5000 5000 Thats what im using for my 508, a really good one.

Read full topic
